primaryPackages.item: 35mm Camera Packages (4x Mitchell BNC or similar)
primaryPackages.description: Four complete studio camera packages with prime lenses, motors, and magazines. Long-term rental for 35 weeks.

specialtyRigs.description: Includes rental of two 70mm Super Panavision packages, high-speed Photosonics cameras for specific scenes, and custom underwater housing fabrication and rental.

accessories.description: Comprehensive package of Cooke Speed Panchro and anamorphics, Angenieux zooms, O'Connor fluid heads, tripods, and other support. 35-week rental.

expendables.description: Weekly expendables including camera tape, lens cleaner, lubricants, and marking tools for 35 weeks.

studioPackage.description: Extensive lighting for studio work, including Carbon Arc 'Brutes', 20Ks, 10Ks, 5Ks, and Mole-Richardson tungsten units for 24 weeks.

specialtyLighting.description: Rental and testing of early HMI lighting prototypes for specific applications.

generators.description: Rental of three blimped 750amp generators to provide consistent, sound-proofed power for the entire 35-week shoot.

rigging.description: Full package of heavy-duty cabling, distribution boxes, and large-scale manual resistance dimmer boards.

expendables.description: High-volume expendables including gels, diffusion, and replacement carbons for arc lights.

dollies.description: Long-term rental of four Chapman or Fisher dollies with track for 35 weeks.

cranes.description: Long-term rental of a large Chapman Titan crane for studio and select location work.

rigging.description: Comprehensive rigging package including scaffolding, stands, flags, nets, and mounting hardware.

expendables.description: Weekly expendables including rope, sash cord, clamps, and tape.

recordingPackage.description: Primary and backup Nagra magnetic tape recorders, boom poles, and a comprehensive microphone package (Neumann, Sennheiser).

specialRecording.description: On-set audio playback systems and production-wide wired intercom communications.

communications.description: Not applicable in this era for on-set primary comms, covered by wired intercom.

expendables.description: Includes magnetic tape stock, batteries, and maintenance supplies.

mechanicalEffects.description: Budget for design, engineering, fabrication, and safety certification of the 30-foot rotating centrifuge set, multiple zero-gravity wire rigs, and rotating camera mounts.

opticalEffects.description: Budget for R&D and fabrication of a 7-axis motion control rig for model photography and a large-scale front projection system with multiple 8x10 projectors and a custom beam-splitter.

editingRooms.description: Rental of four editing rooms equipped with Moviola and KEM flatbed editors for an estimated 40-week post-production schedule.

soundMixing.description: Rental of a 6-track magnetic sound mixing facility for final audio mixdown over 8 weeks.

opticalWork.description: Extensive rental of a high-precision Oxberry or Acme optical printing bay for all visual effects compositing, titles, and transitions.

equipmentTrucks.description: Dedicated trucks for Camera, Grip, and Lighting departments for the duration of the shoot.

specialTransport.description: Includes international air freight for 70mm camera systems from the US and heavy-haulage flatbed trucks for centrifuge components.
